item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, there! 👋 I’m glad you found my website. I’m currently… 🎓 A Computer Science student at ShanghaiTech University. 🎈 An OIer / ACMer - Programming Contest Enthusiast. 🌱 Interested in Machine Learning, and Computer Graphics. 🌐 Learning more about Web Development, working with both React and Vue. 📷 Love taking photos and filming videos. 💼 Having an internship at Deemos, working on the most advanced DigitalHuman and 3D face reconstruction.
